module.name: Reboot Options
module.summary: Adds reboot options to power menu
module.description:
Adds reboot options to power menu.

  • Common reboot
  • Hot reboot
  • Reboot to Recovery
  • Reboot to Bootloader
  • Switch system (Mi-phones)
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: T9 Module
module.summary: Adds international contacts search to dialer.
module.description: Adds international contacts (and service numbers) search to dialer. After activating rebuild T9 index in Contacts application settings
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Browser Autofit
module.summary: Browser pages autofit
module.description: Adds "Mobile View" to the General browser settings. This feature allows you to adjust the text on Web pages to fit the width of the screen depending on the page font size.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: AlarmTime fix
module.summary: Fix for third-party alarms
module.description: Fixes rounding response time to 5 minutes for third-party alarm clocks.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Play Store Fixes
module.summary: Fake the density for Google Play Store
module.description: Fake the density that is submitted to Google in order to make Play Store show all apps.
module.author: rovo89

module.name: Auto Orientation
module.summary: Landscape orientation in selected application
module.description:
Adds the ability to view applications in landscape mode. To make it work go to the device screen settings and activate "Auto-rotate screen" option.
On some devices may not be displayed correctly.
No need to reboot after changing settings.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Carrier Label
module.summary: Allows to edit your carrier label
module.description:
Allows to edit your carrier label. Available in Settings - Status Bar - Carrier label.


May NOT work on some devices!
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Current Track Launch
module.summary: Launch the playback screen in the player
module.description: Allows you to launch playback screen of the current track in Music player when you click on a pop-up widget (opens by slide on the icon on home screen). By default, the main screen opens, like with a simple click on the player icon.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Search in Google Play
module.summary: Adds an option to choose marketplace to use with search
module.description:
You can choose in module settings what marketplace should be used for searching in QuickSearchBox (Google PlayStore or Xiaomi Market).
Go to the module settings to select marketplace.
No need to reboot after changing settings.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Units
module.summary: Measure units for different languages (Mb, Gb etc.)
module.description:
Allows you to change the measure units depending on the system language.

  • Status bar: network speed (K/s, m/s)
  • Task manager: freed, available memory (MB, GB)
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Volume Control Mute
module.summary: Disables ugly BEEP sound while adjusting volume
module.description: This module disables (mutes) the beeper while adjusting volume at home screen (floating volume panel).
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: YellowPage
module.summary: Local YellowPage database
module.description: Blocks updates of the Yellow Pages database from Chinese server and adds the ability to "Mark" unknown contacts.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Volume Skip Track
module.summary: Allows to skip tracks in Music player by volume keys
module.description: Allows to skip tracks in Music player by volume keys (while phone screen is off).
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Extra Battery info
module.summary: Adds extra battery info to battery settings
module.description: Adds extra battery info to battery settings
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Hide Icons Text
module.summary: Hides launcher icon labels
module.description: Allows you to to hide launcher icon and folder labels.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: KeyboardFix
module.summary: Fixes FC in Xperia TM keyboard
module.description: Fixes FC in Xperia TM keyboard.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: MMS Festival
module.summary: Russian SMS festival
module.description:
Replaces the Chinese online database of SMS-congratulations to Russian server miui.su.
If the tab "Pre-written" is missing, it must be enabled in MMS application settings, you can update content by pressing "Menu" - "Update"
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Center Clock
module.summary: Allows to change statusbar clock layout
module.description:
Allows to change statusbar clock layout. All available mods you can find in module settings.
NOTE: May not work on unofficial and 2-SIM devices!
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog:
• Added iOS7 layout with percentage battery
  • Small fixes

module.name: Holidays
module.summary: Russian, Ukrainian holidays for calendar and alarm
module.description:
Adds the ability to select the settings of holidays in calendar.


In module settings available servers are: miui.com, romz.bz and miui.su.

Available holidays:

  • Original (Chinese)
  • Russian
  • Ukrainian
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: WSM tools
module.summary: This is the installer and manager for the Xposed framework, which is a requirement for all modules
module.description:
This is the installer for the Xposed framework, which is a requirement for all modules.

This framework is based on rovo89\'s Xposed framework. Like an original project it is a framework for modules that can change the behavior of the system and apps without touching any APKs

Note that this only works with root access on Android 4.0.3 or later.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog:
• Added Xposed repository (available in settings). Both repositories will be shown in the same list, WSM modules will have \"MI\" image at the bottom right corner.
  • Alert dialog will popup when WSM tools update available.
  • Added Feedback to settings.
  • Reworked About screen.
  • Reworked Manage screen.
  • Small fixes.

• Since v2.0.0 WSM can handle MIUI resources
  • Check for updates moved from About to Settings
  • Updated framework
• Since v2.0.0 WSM can handle MIUI resources
